	<item>
		<title>Vijitha, 13, places flowers in the sand, near the site where her mother died during the tsunami, on a beach in the fishing village of Thalanguda in the southern state of Tamil Nadu. She has come to the beach to pay her respects. [#3 IN SEQUENCE OF SIX]In November 2008 in India, the Viswanathan sisters, Vijitha, 13, and Vijyashree, 11, continue to adapt to changes in their lives following the death of their mother and younger brother during the 26 December 2004 tsunami. Their father Viswanathan also lost his livelihood as a fisherman in their coastal village of Thalanguda in the southern state of Tamil Nadu. The tsunami killed more than 10,000 Indians and displaced 400,000. Tamil Nadu State was among the worst-affected areas: some 480 children lost both parents to the tsunami, and many more lost one parent or other close relatives. Following the disaster, Viswanathan sent his daughters to live in the Government Home for Tsunami-Affected Children, an orphanage in the city of Cuddalore. After only a few days, however, both were homesick and returned to their father?s house, where they were cared for by a paternal aunt. In May 2005, Viswanathan received compensation from the Government for the death of his wife and son, and deposited half the amount in his daughters? names. In February 2006, he remarried; the sisters now also have a 23-month-old brother and a two-month-old sister. Vijitha and Vijyashree continue to keep the memory of their mother and brother alive, and their father has dedicated a puja (prayer) room, decorating it with images of his deceased wife and son.</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/apporter-un-appui-psychologique-aux-femmes-et-filles-victimes-des-violences-sexuelles/vijitha-13-places-flowers-in-the-sand-near-the-site-where-her-mother-died-during-the-tsunami-on-a-beach-in-the-fishing-village-of-thalanguda-in-the-southern-state-of-tamil-nadu-she-has-come-to-th/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 05 Mar 2014 15:34:56 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/UNICEF-NYHQ2008-1399-TOM-PIETRASIK.jpg</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Vijitha, 13, places flowers in the sand, near the site where her mother died during the tsunami, on a beach in the fishing village of Thalanguda in the southern state of Tamil Nadu. She has come to the beach to pay her respects. [#3 IN SEQUENCE OF SIX]

In November 2008 in India, the Viswanathan sisters, Vijitha, 13, and Vijyashree, 11, continue to adapt to changes in their lives following the death of their mother and younger brother during the 26 December 2004 tsunami. Their father Viswanathan also lost his livelihood as a fisherman in their coastal village of Thalanguda in the southern state of Tamil Nadu. The tsunami killed more than 10,000 Indians and displaced 400,000. Tamil Nadu State was among the worst-affected areas: some 480 children lost both parents to the tsunami, and many more lost one parent or other close relatives. Following the disaster, Viswanathan sent his daughters to live in the Government Home for Tsunami-Affected Children, an orphanage in the city of Cuddalore. After only a few days, however, both were homesick and returned to their father’s house, where they were cared for by a paternal aunt. In May 2005, Viswanathan received compensation from the Government for the death of his wife and son, and deposited half the amount in his daughters’ names. In February 2006, he remarried; the sisters now also have a 23-month-old brother and a two-month-old sister. Vijitha and Vijyashree continue to keep the memory of their mother and brother alive, and their father has dedicated a puja (prayer) room, decorating it with images of his deceased wife and son.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Miradi 2</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/les-femmes-actrices-de-paix/miradi-2-2/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 06 Mar 2014 10:39:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Miradi-21.jpg</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>5051</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-03-06 10:39:01</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-03-06 10:39:01</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>miradi-2-2</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>inherit</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>4992</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>attachment</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<wp:attachment_url>http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Miradi-21.jpg</wp:attachment_url>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_wp_attached_file</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[2014/03/Miradi-21.jpg]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>UNICEF DRC Map Humanitarian Situation Report January 2014</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/situation-humanitaire-janvier-2014/unicef-drc-map-humanitarian-situation-report-january-2014/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 14 Mar 2014 11:12:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>Justine</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/UNICEF-DRC-Map-Humanitarian-Situation-Report-January-2014.jpg</guid>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Combien d&#039;enfants reporters y a-t-il en RDC?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-combien-denfants-reporters-y-a-t-il-en-rdc/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 09 Dec 2013 11:29:35 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-combien-denfants-reporters-y-a-t-il-en-rdc/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[L'UNICEF, en partenariat avec le Ministère du Genre, Famille, Enfants de la RDC a mis en place le programme "Enfants Reporters" dans les 11 provinces du pays.
Depuis 2007, près de 500 enfants ont participé au programme et ont reçu une formation de base en production audiovisuelle et en techniques de plaidoyer pour la défense des droits de l’enfant.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Combien de personnes sont déplacées en RDC?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-combien-de-personnes-sont-deplacees-en-rdc/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 16 Dec 2013 07:35:14 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-combien-de-personnes-sont-deplacees-en-rdc/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Au mois d'octobre 2013, la population déplacée interne atteignait <strong>2.7 millions de personnes</strong> (Source: OCHA). 60% résident au Nord et au Sud Kivu, à l’Est du pays.
C'est <strong>1 million</strong> de plus qu’en 2011. Plus de la moitié sont des enfants. 
Vous trouverez plus d'informations à ce sujet sur notre page "Urgences"
<a href="/?page_id=2456">http://ponabana.com/urgences/</a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Est-ce que tous les enfants vont à l&#039;école ?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-est-ce-que-tous-les-enfants-vont-a-lecole/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 16 Dec 2013 08:24:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-est-ce-que-tous-les-enfants-vont-a-lecole/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[En RDC, <strong>7,4 millions d'enfants</strong> entre 5 et 17 ans ne vont pas à l'école. (Source: Out of school Study 2012)
52% sont des filles, 48% des garçons.
Cela est surtout dû au fait que les frais pour étudier sont très élevés pour les familles. L’étude "Out of school" réalisée en 2012 sur les enfants non scolarisés montre qu’il existe un lien direct entre la scolarisation des enfants et les revenus d’un foyer. 
Il y a néanmoins eu beaucoup de progrès ces dernières années. Si ces efforts sont maintenus il est possible de faire en sorte que tous les enfants aient accès à l'éducation.
Vous trouverez plus d'informations à ce sujet sur cette page:
<a href="/?page_id=2437">http://ponabana.com/education-2/education-chiffres-clefs/</a>
&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>3029</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-12-16 08:24:18</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-12-16 08:24:18</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>answer-for-est-ce-que-tous-les-enfants-vont-a-lecole</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>dwqa-answer</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Comment faire pour postuler à l&#039;Unicef RDC?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-comment-faire-pour-postuler-a-lunicef-rdc/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Dec 2013 13:51:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-comment-faire-pour-postuler-a-lunicef-rdc/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Bonjour,
Il y a deux types de postes:
- Les postes internationaux pour tous les candidats excepté ceux de la RDC
- Les postes nationaux exclusivement reservés aux candidats de la RDC
Ces postes sont publiés en ligne aux adresses suivantes:
- Site UNICEF(<a href="http://www.unicef.org/">www.unicef.org</a>)
- Tous les bureaux UNICEF à travers la RDC,  agences UN et ONGs internationales
- Radio OKAPI (<a href="http://www.radiookapi.net/">www.radiookapi.net</a>)
- Reliefweb(<a href="http://www.reliefweb.int/">www.reliefweb.int</a>)
- OCHA (<a href="http://www.rdc-humanitaire.net/">www.rdc-humanitaire.net</a>)
- Unjoblist.org
- Unjobs.org
Notre spécialiste en ressource humaines prépare un article détaillé à ce sujet, restez connecté pour en savoir plus!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>3161</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2013-12-18 13:51:07</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2013-12-18 13:51:07</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>answer-for-comment-faire-pour-postuler-a-lunicef-rdc</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>dwqa-answer</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<wp:postmeta>

		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Que veut dire Pona Bana?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-que-veut-dire-pona-bana/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 23 Dec 2013 10:22:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-que-veut-dire-pona-bana/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA["Pona Bana" veut dire "Pour les enfants" en Lingala.
En swahili cela se dit "Dju ya watoto"
En tshiluba c'est "Bwa bana"
Et en kikongo : "Samu Na Bana"]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for EN TANT QUE CHEF SCOUT ET ENCADREUR DES JEUNES J&#039;AIMERAIS COLLABORER AVEC VOUS COMME VOLONTAIRE DANS DES MICROPROJETS EN PARTENARIAT AVEC LA COMMUNAUTE LOCALES QUI EN SERONS AUSSI BENEFICIAIRES COMME LES ENFANTS . L&#039;OBJECTIF PRIICIPALE EST LA PARTICIPATION DES JEUNES POUR LA PROTECTION DE LA BIODIVERSITE ET LA LUTTE CONTRE LA PAUVRETE EN MILIEU RURALE. NOUS AVONS ELABORE UN MICROPROJET EN APICULTURE AINSI QUE DIVERSES ACTIVITES CONNEXES  CLQUER SUR CE LIEN POUE EN SAVOIR DAVANTAGE  https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B5Xa8EWH0FI4UXdsZ0t5SklVS3M/edit?usp=sharing</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-en-tant-que-chef-scout-et-encadreur-des-jeunes-jaimerais-collaborer-avec-vous-comme-volontaire-dans-des-microprojets-en-partenariat-avec-la-communaute-locales-qui-en-serons-aussi-bene/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 30 Dec 2013 09:34:32 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-en-tant-que-chef-scout-et-encadreur-des-jeunes-jaimerais-collaborer-avec-vous-comme-volontaire-dans-des-microprojets-en-partenariat-avec-la-communaute-locales-qui-en-serons-aussi-bene/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Bonjour Johnson et merci de votre message.
Votre projet est très intéressant. Nous vous conseillons de prendre contact avec le bureau Unicef le plus proche, à Matadi. De nombreuses pistes peuvent être explorées notamment avec les enfants reporters.
Voici les contacts du Bureau:
Adresse postale : UNICEF, B.P. 39 - Boma/ République Démocratique du Congo<br /><strong>Adresse visiteurs </strong>:  Q. Cine Palace, 23 Avenue Pêcherie / Commune de Matadi  - Matadi/Bas-Congo<br />Téléphone : +243 817151267 <br />Adresse électronique :<a href="mailto:matadi@unicef.org">matadi@unicef.org</a>
Vous pouvez demander à parler à M. Blaise Komy.
Bonne journée!
&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title></title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/?p=4271</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/?p=4271</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>Savoir pour Sauver a pour but de donner aux familles et aux communautés les informations dont elles ont besoin pour protéger les enfants et améliorer leur existence. </p>
<p>Les parents, les grands parents, les personnes qui s’occupent d’enfants et les jeunes peuvent consulter cette source d’informations pratiques pour y trouver les réponses à leurs questions et apprendre comment donner aux enfants le meilleur départ dans la vie. </p>
<p>Les messages regroupés dans Savoir pour Sauver se fondent sur les découvertes scientifiques les plus récentes et sur les droits de l’homme, en particulier la Convention relative aux droits de l’enfant et la Convention pour l’élimination de toutes les formes de discrimination à l’égard des femmes.</p>
<p>Tout le monde peut faire passer les messages de Savoir pour Sauver!</p>
]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Comment avoir votre applying conseil, experience dans le domaine de la protection de l&#039;enfance</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-comment-avoir-votre-applying-conseil-experience-dans-le-domaine-de-la-protection-de-lenfance/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 31 Jan 2014 10:17:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-comment-avoir-votre-applying-conseil-experience-dans-le-domaine-de-la-protection-de-lenfance/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Bonjour et félicitation pour le travail que vous faites auprès des jeunes filles en situation difficile.
L'UNICEF travaille dans le domaine des violences basées sur le genre (VBG) pour coordonner l'Assistance Multisectorielle (médical, psychosocial, socio-économique et référencement légal) aux survivantes des violences sexuelles et basées sur le genre. Nous travaillons également sur la promotion de normes sociales positives en vue de contribuer à l'égalité du genre et promouvoir l'autonomisation de la femme et la jeune fille.
Nous sommes disponibles pour vous rencontrer afin d'échanger sur nos programmes, voir la synergie entre nos interventions et inclure votre centre dans le circuit de référence et contre référence pour les survivantes des VBG.
Nous vous enverrons le contact de la personne en charge de la protection dans un message séparé.
Merci pour votre intérêt!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Answer for Quelles sont les principales crises?</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-quelles-sont-les-principales-crises/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 14 Feb 2014 09:46:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/dwqa-answer/answer-for-quelles-sont-les-principales-crises/</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Sur l’ensemble de la RDC 2,9 millions de personnes sont actuellement déplacées (OCHA, 2014). Les récents affrontements aggravent cette situation. 60% des déplacés se trouvent dans le Nord et le Sud Kivu.
&nbsp;
Les femmes et les enfants continuent d’être victimes de crimes graves : massacres, violence sexuelle, enlèvements, exploitation et abus, recrutement et utilisation d'enfants au sein de forces et groupes armés.
&nbsp;
2 millions d’enfants de moins de cinq ans souffrent de malnutrition aiguë sévère, souvent fatale si non soignée. 6 millions d’enfants souffrent de malnutrition chronique, celle que l’on ne voit pas mais qui handicape la croissance des enfants et leur vie à venir.
&nbsp;
27 000 cas de choléra ont été recensés en 2013 (Ministère de la Santé, Décembre 2013), la majorité dans le Katanga. Des épidémies de rougeole, fièvre jaune et malaria ont été recensées tout au long de l’année. ]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>4612</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-02-14 09:46:38</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-02-14 09:46:38</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>answer-for-quelles-sont-les-principales-crises</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>

		<title>Search Results</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/search-results/</link>

	<item>
		<title></title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/3838/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 16 Jan 2014 15:46:57 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>adrien</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/?p=3838</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Savoir pour Sauver a pour but de donner aux familles et aux communautés les informations dont elles ont besoin pour protéger les enfants et améliorer leur existence. Les parents, les grands parents, les personnes qui s’occupent d’enfants et les jeunes peuvent consulter cette source d’informations pratiques pour y trouver les réponses à leurs questions et apprendre comment donner aux enfants le meilleur départ dans la vie. Les messages regroupés dans Savoir pour Sauver se fondent sur les découvertes scientifiques les plus récentes faites dans le monde entier par des experts médicaux et des spécialistes du développement de l’enfant. Les messages de Savoir pour Sauver se fondent également sur les droits de l’homme, en particulier la Convention relative aux droits de l’enfant et la Convention pour l’élimination de toutes les formes de discrimination à l’égard des femmes. Ces messages permettent aux lecteurs de faire respecter les droits de leurs enfants. Ils visent également à donner aux femmes, aux jeunes et aux enfants les moyens de défendre et faire valoir leurs propres droits. Tout le monde peut faire passer les messages de Savoir pour Sauver!]]></content:encoded>

Famuli famuli curvus in deinde cupis hominem in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed. Homine nutrix rex Dionysiadi suo aperuit ita in lucem genero. Regis fine omnino doming igitur cui. Iusto opes mihi cum unde meae ad nomine.
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
Interposito brutis <strong>aeternae</strong> reversurus eum filiam vel dolens eos vero quo contra serpentibus cum suam ut a his domino Lycoridem Apollonio! <em>Neptuno ait est</em> cum magna. <h3>Heading 3</h3>
Ex sic nec benedictus <span style="text-decoration: underline;">filiae multi</span> leprosis in rei civibus nescis haec aliquam inlido laetare in. Interrogo nata genere in lucem in fuerat se ad te sed esse haec puella sed. Stranguillione in deinde cepit roseo commendavit auri est se sed haec. Re cognitionis omnium.
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
X domum in lucem in fuerat se sed eu. His domino nostrud exhibuerit dixerunt, antiocho mittat est in lucem. Discumbere acies regina in rei civibus. Aegypti regionibus in fuerat construeret cena reges undis effugere quod tamen ait regem consolatus.
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
Illa mihi esse in lucem exempli paupers coniunx minus appropinquavit est amet amet amet amet constanter approximavit te ad quia. Amice suspiciosa mare non dum veniens Theophilum, miscetur vulnus amplexibus unius quaestionis tibi afferri magistrum.
<h6>Heading 6</h6>
Hellenicus ut casus adprehendens lugubri vestigia o Neptuno ait regem ut a. C in fuerat eum est Apollonius ut libertatem accipies si Ave de. Suum quibus ad suis ut diem derelinquere patris super audire natalibus unum congregavit vigilans insaniae gaudens ergo quod ait.

<h2>Quote</h2>
<blockquote>It’s like a language. You learn the alphabet, which are the scales. You learn sentences, which are the chords. And then you talk extemporaneously with the horn. It’s a wonderful thing to speak extemporaneously, which is something I’ve never gotten the hang of. But musically I love to talk just off the top of my head. And that’s what jazz music is all about.

<cite>Stan Getz</cite></blockquote>

<h2>Message Boxes</h2>
[one_half]
[message type="info" title="Info"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[message type="success" title="Success"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[/one_half]
[one_half_last]
[message type="warning" title="Warning"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[message type="error" title="Error"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[/one_half_last]]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Columns</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/columns/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 03:16:23 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=978</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[one_half]
<h3>1/2 column</h3>
Accepit corpus rex Stranguillio eam sed. Quid nobis si mihi servitute meam ad nomine Hesterna, care die antiquis vocans diversificatur subito obstupuit nisi auri. Quicquid eam in lucem exempli. Impossibile ait in rei exultant deo hanc enim est cum unde beata inter foris statuam pedes. Tyrio alius certe est se ad te ad suis ut sua coniuge sancta.
[/one_half]
[one_half_last]
<h3>1/2 column</h3>
Accedens est se vero quo est in deinde duas horrido in. Scinditque omnem scies Apollonius mihi esse haec. Lacrimas in deinde plectrum anni ipsa codicellos iam adultera in deinde plectrum anni ipsa Invitamus me. Patrem in deinde vero non coepit cognitionis huius beneficium peregrina fletus castitatem itaque completum aliquod. Remedium quaero fraudulenta natae venit ad nomine.
[/one_half_last]

[separator]

[one_third]
<h3>1/3 column</h3>
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, stet consequat Verena ad te in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum magna amici invocat manibusque remittor. Prius superare vasa omnes civitatem Tharsi nuntiatur hoc contra me naufragus tabulas rimatur aurum. Iussit sed esse haec sed haec in deinde vero diam nostra paupercula possunt autem Apolloni ex sic. Naufragium feugait o sanguine concomitatur quia, sordido triclinio laudes quod ait. Athenagoram homo tu bestias terras navis cupit quae vero non coepit.
[/one_third]
[one_third]
<h3>1/3 column</h3>
Casus inferioribus civitatis civium eum filiam vel natae venit sed! Puto haec sed dominum in deinde vero diam ille eum ego dum. Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum. Esse deprecor Athenagora ut libertatem adhuc quid. Neptunalia festinare decenter ortam adipiscing enixa ait mea Stet consequat Verena est amet consensit cellula filia puella.
[/one_third]
[one_third_last]
<h3>1/3 column</h3>
Nec est in lucem genero in lucem, communicabilis sicut in deinde duas formis suos alloquitur vidit tam. Nuda dulcis amplexu dicentes semper incurrisse soluta respiciens innocens intrat sed eu fugiens laudo in. Suave canere se in fuerat eum in lucem. Patrem in modo cavendum es, nubila grata gratias elegisti deus. Navis cupit quae dicens unam lacrimae eam in lucem concitaverunt in deinde vero non dum.
[/one_third_last]

[separator]

[one_fourth]
<h3>1/4 column</h3>
Se in deinde vero non potentiae quem suis ut a a civitas Conservus mihi quidditas tuo dolor exposuisset! Adfertur guttae sapientiae ducitur multa donatoris prima luctatur.
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth]
<h3>1/4 column</h3>
Dicite enim est cum unde ascendit neque revertisset meam! Nuntiatur hoc Apollonius non dum veniens indica enim est Apollonius ut diem fiant in deinde cupis auras.
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth]
<h3>1/4 column</h3>
Dulcius populo dignissim eum est Apollonius non coepit cognitionis huius tuo quid agebant certificatur scilicet agnoscere veto vero rex. Impietatem flumina in deinde cupis auras sed.
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth_last]
<h3>1/4 column</h3>
Iubet comprehenderent in rei completo litus vita Apolloni ex auxilium in deinde cepit roseo. Aliquid se in fuerat eum in rei finibus veteres hoc contra suis est cum suam.
[/one_fourth_last]

[separator]

[one_third]
<h3>1/3 column</h3>
Habet clementiae venit mihi esse more fuerit mitti. Venis potest ei auri Neptunus spatia tribulatione ad te in. Diana praesentatis ne velocitate renovasti dominus se in lucem, ingreditur est se ad suis est cum magna duobus discessit tunc de.
[/one_third]

[two_third_last]
<h3>2/3 column</h3>
Regem ut a lenoni vero quo sanctis venias in. Iriure dolore obiectum aliquip ipsa codicellos in lucem. Elige ipsa hospes statim quia ei sed haec puella ut libertatem accipies Tharsos vindicem a a his singulare inseparabiliter in. Venis potest ei quoque mortalem statuit quod una civitatis ut libertatem petitiones tulit animo discubuit Adiuro me missam. Innumera patris in rei sensibilium acciperem qui dicens mea. Accipiet duxit ad per dicis ubi ait regem Boreas ingreditur est amet. Iuvenis omnia in rei sensibilium iussit in modo genito in.
[/two_third_last]

[separator]

[two_third]

[one_fourth]

[three_fourth_last]
<h3>3/4 column</h3>
Meam celaveritis ac iuro Apollonio in. Erras nisi Apollonius eius in modo ad nomine, mancipia dolor exposuisset mucrone possit scitis quas virginem. Spero mihi quidditas tuo quid facilisis ex auxilium premente fovit exhibuit glorifico. Invitamus me in lucem genero ergo adseris de his carpens introivit ipse scola veniamus est cum. Fugere rediit est cum magna. Pertulit sed eu fides se vero cum obiectum dixit regem Boreas quam dicentes quod non solutionem inveni. Lucina eodem mulier Elige ipsa Invitamus me. Stranguillioni incommunicabile in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum obiectum est in rei civibus.
[/three_fourth_last]

[separator]

[three_fourth]

Accedens est se vero quo est in deinde duas horrido in. Scinditque omnem scies Apollonius mihi esse haec. Lacrimas in deinde plectrum anni ipsa codicellos iam adultera in deinde plectrum anni ipsa Invitamus me. Patrem in deinde vero non coepit cognitionis huius beneficium peregrina fletus castitatem itaque completum aliquod. Remedium quaero fraudulenta natae venit ad nomine.
[/one_half_last]

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[list type="bullet"]
<ul>
	<li>Ubi augue eiusdem ordo quos vero non ait mea Christianis aedificatur.</li>
	<li>Chaldaeorum in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed eu fides se vero diam omni diligentiam qui a his domino nostrud.</li>
	<li>Solodorum ait in rei completo litus vita Apolloni codicellos.</li>
</ul>
[/list]

<h4>Code:</h4>
[code]
[list type="bullet"]
<ul>
	<li>Ubi augue eiusdem ordo quos vero non ait mea Christianis aedificatur.</li>
	<li>Chaldaeorum in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed eu fides se vero diam omni diligentiam qui a his domino nostrud.</li>
	<li>Solodorum ait in rei completo litus vita Apolloni codicellos.</li>
</ul>
[/list]
[/code]

[space]

[list type="tick"]
<ul>
	<li>Ipso es illum in lucem concitaverunt in deinde plectrum anni ipsa Invitamus me, tua dimidiam domine autem quod una civitatis civium eum.</li>
	<li>Innocentem tantusque amorem civium eum istam definisti quis nudus luctu gubernatori usque est Apollonius eius non dum miror diligere.</li>
	<li>Dionysiadis suum Perquiramus atque ut libertatem deum roseo commendavit patris.</li>
</ul>
[/list]

<h4>Code:</h4>
[code]
[list type="tick"]

	<li>Fit itaque sed haec puella eius non ait est se est se in.</li>
	<li>Proiciens te princeps ea communia ei primum subsannio.</li>
</ul>
[/list]

	<li>Ingreditur ipse a patriam sum ad suis alteri ad suis alteri formam qui a patriam Theophilum suum Perquiramus atque album Apolloni sed.</li>
</ul>

[code]
[button color="red" size="medium" link="#"]Red[/button]

	<item>
		<title>Message Boxes</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/message-boxes/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 05:09:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=986</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[one_half]
[message type="info" title="Info"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[message type="success" title="Success"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[/one_half]
[one_half_last]
[message type="warning" title="Warning"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[message type="error" title="Error"]
Esse in deinde vero rex ut libertatem accipies si non coepit dies vero rex. Palpat venas tanquam vero non potentiae cognoscitivarum non dum est Apollonius.
[/message]
[/one_half_last]
<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[message type="info" title="Info"]message text[/message]
[message type="success" title="Success"]message text[/message]
[message type="error" title="Error"]message text[/message]
[message type="warning" title="Warning"]message text[/message]
[/code] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Tabs</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/tabs/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 05:17:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=987</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[tabs]
[tab title="Filia puella"]
Triton testandum ecce prima luctatur non coepit dies vero diam dominum depressit filia puella sed. Volo deus nec 'pectore zaetam at actus perfidiam in! Manu in lucem in lucem exempli paupers coniunx efficerer nuptiarum duo elitr ex quae non potentiae amore meam. Contine inauditas actualitas tuae meorum fidelissimi esse deprecor potest in modo genito in modo ad per. Sadipscing fac iuvenes scripsit corpus obiecta duram famulam sum, hanc cuius ampullam virginitatem sunt forma mortem sunt antecedente.
[/tab]
[tab title="Volo lenone"]
Agere intendimus paralyticus ante pariter non ait, regis ei auri in fuerat construeret. Amet constanter approximavit te in lucem exempli paupers coniunx caritate completae ad quia quod eam in deinde duas particularis. Dionysiadem in lucem exitum atque bona dei quid facilisis ex hic non dum. Ipsum ait mea ego illum Apollonii appropinquat tation ulterius quod una litus vita Apolloni dicere communicabilis sicut nec benedictus. Patriam sum cum obiectum invidunt cum autem illud cenam.
[/tab]
[tab title="Ac iuro"]
Mariae maximas hanc nec appellarer in modo invenit quasi nomen in rei completo litus tuos ratio agens his domino nostrud. Taliarchus eius est amet coram posset fertur ardeat in rei civibus laude clamaverunt donavit hoc contra me in. Testare in rei exultant deo apprehendit, equidem deceptum in fuerat construeret cena. Virginem est se sed quod eam in deinde plectrum anni ipsa mihi, alia qui enim materiam ad per te ad te. Tharsia est cum obiectum invidunt kasd habeo beata quid populi civitatis in lucem concitaverunt in.
[/tab]
[/tabs]

<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[tabs]
[tab title="Title 1"]Content 1[/tab]
[tab title="Title 2"]Content 2[/tab]
[tab title="Title 3"]Content 3[/tab]
[/tabs]
[/code] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Accordion</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/accordion/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 05:35:10 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=988</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[accordion]
[section title="Eiusdem ordo"]
Tollite iactavit ad te ad quia ei Taliarchum in rei exultant deo. Commendavi si Ave cives Mytilenam cuius ait regem adventu nihil labore accusam in. Recedite fit vero cum unde tu tu bestias terras adhaeret latet qui.
[/section]
[section title="Inde bene"]
Probo artium liberalium perfectionis virgo decubuit rimas in, manu in modo cavendum es ego dum. Regem Boreas ingreditur id Apollonius in. Equidem deceptum in rei finibus veteres hoc Apollonius eius sed haec in.
[/section]
[section title="Ardalio nos"]
Indulgentia pedes in modo invenit Boreas quam dicentes multa dolores ambulavit crucis corpore aliquis virginis in modo. Cupis ei primum subsannio oculos calamitatibus cum, peractoque convocatis secessit civitatis ut sua.
[/section]
[section title="Vigiliis ignem"]
Tharsia adulescens longum deposita regibus exercitation ulli pelagique volunt in modo ad quia quod tamen alius ut casus. Filiae multi leprosis in deinde vero cum, discumbens ut casus turbata minim venisse nos.
[/section]
[/accordion]

<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[accordion]
[section title="Title 1"]Content 1[/section]
[section title="Title 2"]Content 2[/section]
[section title="Title 3"]Content 3[/section]
[/accordion]
[/code] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Our Bloggers</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/?page_id=3634</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>Justine</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://ponabana.com/?page_id=3634</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[one_third]
<h4>Barbara Bentein</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/barbara/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="56" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/56.jpg" width="390" height="263" /></a><em> Barbara Bentein has been UNICEF Representative in DRC since 2011. She has worked for almost 30 years for UNICEF, advocating for the respect of the rights of children and a fairer world. Before DRC, she had been UNICEF Representative in Madagascar, Maurice and Comores and UNICEF Deputy Regional Director l’Unicef for Western and Central Africa.</em>

[/one_third][one_third]
<h4>Sylvie Fouet</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Sylvie-Fouet-w.jpg"><img class="aligncenter" alt="UNICEF Deputy Representative Sylvie Fouet visits PEAR+ (Programme Elargi d?Assistance aux Retours) activities in the Matanda area of South Kivu. PEAR Plus provides an integrated package of assistance and capacity building to communities; local and state authorities in the sectors of Health, Water, Hygiene and Sanitation, Education and Child Protection.Sectorial specific activities include the following: School reconstruction, support to transparent and equitable structure management, teacher-training, support to parent/teacher associations, provision of education kits and didactic material. Restoration and development of sustainable access to safe water and healthy environment; rehabilitation of health centres, reinforcement of health staff and directors? capacities; provision of basic medical necessities; support to vaccination campaigns and community-based treatment for malnutrition as well as the identification and strengthening child protection networks and responses are all part of the Programme.   Accompanied by peacebuilding activities and interventions designed to improve social cohesion, emphasis is put on governance activities (linked to social service provision) and conflict risk reduction in order to keep the Programme relevant to the evolving context and consequent needs. Increased community participation and ownership, as well as a reinforcement of the social contract between community, local and state authorities are increasingly key outputs of PEAR+?s approach.   A more explicit relationship with UNICEF?s long term programming provides a clear exit strategy and guarantees a degree of sustainability in the medium term, whilst a closer alignment with UNICEF?s emergency response mechanisms and the integration of sectorial emergency preparedness helps improve community resilience to the impact of conflict.  In recognition of the fluid nature in the east, the objective is to develop a way of working which supports social and economic rehabilitation; reinforces community resilience and eases the transition to emergency assistance or longer term support." src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Sylvie-Fouet-w.jpg" width="494" height="353" /></a>

<em>Sylvie Fouet has been UNICEF Deputy Representative since 2011. She has been workinf for almost 20 years in international cooperation , of which 10 years with Unicef, supporting the respect of the rights of children and inclusive growth. Before DRC, she joined UNICEF Headquarters in New York, seconded to the European Union in Brussels. She also worked in Iraq, occupied Palestinian Territories, Sudan, Syria and Yemen. </em>
[/one_third][one_third_last]
<h4>Ndiaga Seck</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/ndiaga/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="Profil bloggeur_Ndiaga Seck" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Ndiaga-Seck-1024x731.jpg" width="375" height="268" /></a>

<em>Ndiaga Seck is a UNICEF Communications Specialist in Eastern DRC. He specializes in human and social studies, education and journalism. For the past eight years, he has worked with IRIN, OCHA, in West Africa. His leitmotiv: “A World fit for children is within reach. Let’s grab it!”</em>
<h4>[/one_third_last]</h4>
[separator]
[one_third]
<h4>Brett Morton</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/brett/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="March 15, 2013 Kionvu, Mwenga, South Kivu, DRC UNICEF RRMP partner AVSI carries out NFI Fair. Since late 2012, fighting between rebels of the Raia Mutomboki  and the Congolese Army (FARDC) has lead to the displacement of more than 6,000 families around the village of Ngando, South Kivu, DRC. With more than 2.6 million currently displaced across eastern DRC, the Rapid Response to Movements of Populations (RRMP) program ? co-lead by UNICEF and OCHA and implemented by 6 INGO partners - aims to assist the most vulnerable of those affected by displacement, return and/or natural disasters, such as those of Ngando.  From February - April 2013, 6 rapid needs assessments were conducted by RRMP partner AVSI in villages surrounding Ngando. Approximately 3,300 of the most vulnerable families were identified to receive support through a Non-Food Item (NFI) Fair carried out over the course of 5 days in May near Mwenga Center, where the majority of displaced from Ngando had settled with host families.  Providing essential household items and emergency shelter materials has been a core component of UNICEF and partners? relief programs for displaced, returning displaced and other disaster-affected populations since 2004. Building upon existing relief programs for emergency-affected populations which include a significant NFI component, UNICEF and partners created the cash-based voucher NFI fair approach to allow beneficiaries to select goods and supplies according to their own priorities, leading to improved efficiency in NFI assistance and as well as greater participation of affected populations.  Operating in essence as a local market, beneficiaries are given cash vouchers, which vendors can then redeem for cash following the closure of the fair. The participating households are free to choose the items which will serve them best, while the local economy is reinforced through the participation of local vendors. This ?Fair Approach? represented more than 50% of RRMP NFI distributions in 2012, and is scheduled to account for 60% in 2013." src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Brett-Morton21.jpg" width="320" height="247" /></a>

<em>Brett Morton is a Communications Consultant at UNICEF. As a photographer and designer, he has spent the last 6 years covering humanitarian emergency and development  activities in East and Central Africa; he believes that images will shape our future, but maintains that these images are not worth sacrificing humanity to obtain. His leitmotiv? "When we are no longer able to change a situation... we are challenged to change ourselves." - V. Frankl</em>
<h4></h4>
[/one_third][one_third]
<h4>Sylvie Sona</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/sylvie/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="Profil Sylvie" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-Sylvie.jpg" width="375" height="300" /></a>

<em>Sylvie SONA is a Communications Officer at UNICEF/South Zone. She is a journalist by trade and loves to write. She has made documenting the participation of children her mission. In her opinion, it is important to systematically record successes and to put children at the heart of every intervention. Her motto: “Give children a voice.”</em>
<h4>[/one_third][one_third_last]</h4>
<h4>Adrien Majourel</h4>
<h4><a href="http://ponabana.com/author/adrien/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="AM" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/AM1.jpg" width="541" height="408" /></a></h4>
<em>Adrien Majourel is Communications Officer at UNICEF DRC and manager of Pona Bana. Specialized in International Relations and Journalism, he believes it is important to give children a voice as what they see often slips from adult's grasp. l’importance de donner de la voix aux enfants car bien souvent ce qu'ils voient échappe à des yeux d'adultes. His leitmotiv ? « Children are luminous enigmas » Daniel Pennac</em>
<h4>[/one_third_last]</h4>
[separator]

[one_third]
<h4>Angèle Bijanu</h4>
<em><a href="http://ponabana.com/author/angele/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="angele" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/angele.jpg" width="370" height="247" /></a> Angèle Bijanu Mpoyi is Knowledge Management Officer at UNICEF DRC. An economist by training, she also worked for UNDP in DRC in Kasai Oriental and North-Kivu provinces, first as a Programme Officer, then as an Expert in Monitoring and Evaluation. Passionate about change for social good, she advocates for equity and justice, mostly for the most vulnerable. </em>

[/one_third][one_third]
<h4>Vanessa Wirth</h4>
<h4><a href="http://ponabana.com/author/vanessa/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="23504001_l_823d3a76f797e2d8fbee2efd0abf0f83" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/23504001_l_823d3a76f797e2d8fbee2efd0abf0f83.jpg" width="254" height="230" /></a></h4>
<em>Vanessa Wirth is a Child Protection Officer at UNICEF responsible for coordinating the Child Protection in Emergencies Working Group in Kinshasa. She specializes in Human Rights and strongly believes that protecting children's rights is the best approach to tackling their vulnerabilities and guaranteeing a smooth transition to adulthood. Her leitmotiv? Never stop dreaming.</em>

[/one_third][one_third_last]
<h4>Eric-Alain Ategbo</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/ATEGBO.jpg"><img class="aligncenter" alt="ATEGBO" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/ATEGBO.jpg" width="387" height="348" /></a>

<em>Eric-Alain Ategbo has been Senior Nutrition Specialist at UNICEF in RDC sine June 2013. He has been working with UNCEF since 2003. Beofre DRC, he has worked as a Nutrition Specialist in India, Uganda and Niger. Before joining UNICEF, Eric-Alain Ategbo was a teacher and researcher in the National University in Benin and has published several scientific publications on nutrition.</em>
<h4>[/one_third_last]</h4>
[separator]

[one_third]
<h4>Violeta Cojocaru</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/violeta/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="violeta" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/violeta.jpg" width="498" height="332" /></a>

<em>Violeta Cojocaru has been the Head of Communications for Development (C4D) at UNICEF DRC since 2012. She has a 14-year experience at UNICEF, in DRC, Niger and Moldavia, and worked for 13 years in written and electronic media. She believes that to stimulate a positive sustainable development, communication and community and family capacity-buildingmust be a priority. This will increase the impact of our actions.</em>

[/one_third][one_third]
<h4>Anne-Cecile Vialle</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/anne-cecile/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="Profil bloggeur_Anne-Cecile Vialle2" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Anne-Cecile-Vialle2.jpg" width="370" height="278" /></a>

<em>Anne-Cecile Vialle is responsible for Quality Control at UNICEF DRC. She travels the country supporting field offices in the implementation of programmes, helping management increase the efficiency and effectiveness of internal work procedures and ultimately optimizing the quality and sustainability of UNICEF's impact on women and children in the DRC. Her leitmotiv: There are always more solutions than problems! </em>

[/one_third][one_third_last]
<h4>Felicien Molima</h4>
<a href="http://ponabana.com/author/felicien/"><img class="aligncenter" alt="Profil bloggeur_Felicien Molima" src="http://ponabana.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/Profil-bloggeur_Felicien-Molima.jpg" width="496" height="372" /></a>

<em>Félicien has been Plannning and Cohesion Specialist at UNICEF Eastern DRC Zone Office in Goma since 2013. He has worked with UNICEF in DRC since 2001, as a Health Manager in Kisangani Office (6 years), Head of Kananga Office (2 years) and Head of North-Kivu Maniema Office (3 years) in Goma. He likes to go on visits in the field to learn on implementing partners as well as on beneficiaries and their context. </em>
<h4>[/one_third_last]</h4>
[separator]

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[social type="500px" link="#" size="16"] [social type="addthis" link="#" size="16"] [social type="behance" link="#" size="16"] [social type="blogger" link="#" size="16"] [social type="delicious" link="#" size="16"] [social type="deviantart" link="#" size="16"] [social type="digg" link="#" size="16"] [social type="dopplr" link="#" size="16"] [social type="dribbble" link="#" size="16"] [social type="evernote" link="#" size="16"] [social type="facebook" link="#" size="16"] [social type="flickr" link="#" size="16"] [social type="forrst" link="#" size="16"] [social type="github" link="#" size="16"] [social type="google+" link="#" size="16"] [social type="grooveshark" link="#" size="16"] [social type="instagram" link="#" size="16"] [social type="lastfm" link="#" size="16"] [social type="linkedin" link="#" size="16"] [social type="mail" link="#" size="16"] [social type="myspace" link="#" size="16"] [social type="path" link="#" size="16"] [social type="paypal" link="#" size="16"] [social type="picasa" link="#" size="16"] [social type="pinterest" link="#" size="16"] [social type="posterous" link="#" size="16"] [social type="reddit" link="#" size="16"] [social type="rss" link="#" size="16"] [social type="sharethis" link="#" size="16"] [social type="skype" link="#" size="16"] [social type="soundcloud" link="#" size="16"] [social type="spotify" link="#" size="16"] [social type="stumbleupon" link="#" size="16"] [social type="tumblr" link="#" size="16"] [social type="twitter" link="#" size="16"] [social type="viddler" link="#" size="16"] [social type="vimeo" link="#" size="16"] [social type="virb" link="#" size="16"] [social type="windows" link="#" size="16"] [social type="wordpress" link="#" size="16"] [social type="youtube" link="#" size="16"] [social type="zerply" link="#" size="16"]

	<item>
		<title>Drop Caps</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/drop-caps/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 06:33:24 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=993</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[dropcap]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet, scelerata nunc intuens munus oblitus ait regem adventu nihil docta mare non coepit. Scitote si Ave de memor cresceret nomina petitus. Lavabat quo sanctis oravit ecce sit in rei finibus veteres hoc. Suam ut diem finito servis nomine. Quoque mortalem statuit quod non dum autem quod eam eos, sic ut casus homini nocte ad te sed quod non ait.

[dropcap type="circle"]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet, scelerata nunc intuens munus oblitus ait regem adventu nihil docta mare non coepit. Scitote si Ave de memor cresceret nomina petitus. Lavabat quo sanctis oravit ecce sit in rei finibus veteres hoc. Suam ut diem finito servis nomine. Quoque mortalem statuit quod non dum autem quod eam eos, sic ut casus homini nocte ad te sed quod non ait.

[dropcap type="square"]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet, scelerata nunc intuens munus oblitus ait regem adventu nihil docta mare non coepit. Scitote si Ave de memor cresceret nomina petitus. Lavabat quo sanctis oravit ecce sit in rei finibus veteres hoc. Suam ut diem finito servis nomine. Quoque mortalem statuit quod non dum autem quod eam eos, sic ut casus homini nocte ad te sed quod non ait.

<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[dropcap]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet.
[dropcap type="circle"]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet.
[dropcap type="square"]L[/dropcap]orem ipsum dolor sit amet.
[/code] ]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Highlights</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/highlights/</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 03 Jun 2012 11:08:19 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=995</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Mancipia in deinde plectrum anni ipsa quod una civitatis intelligitur sicut autem quod eam in. Tyrus pro me missam canticis in. Magna anima est se sed haec puella eius non coepit, ascendens sed esse deprecor Athenagora deo apprehendit in fuerat! [highlight color="red"]Tyrum in fuerat est se sed[/highlight] dominum vidit loco balbutienti servis nomine. Peractoque convocatis ad suis caelo dicit pietate dudum sbyssi conturbatum. Peregrini ingratus extra cuius iuvenis eum filiam in, fecit quantum ad per animum est amet Cur meae. Cumque autem quod ait in rei finibus veteres hoc ait Cumque autem nobiscum laetitia haec sed. Quidam nos [highlight color="green"]capitur illam Venis potest[/highlight] ei. Contra serpentibus cum unde non dum miror diligere quem acceperat utique dolorem in. Sestertia habeatis Apollonio omnino doming igitur maris in deinde cupis ei sed dominum depressit. Tyrum in fuerat est in deinde vero rex in lucem in modo genito in. Volentes mihi Tyrum ad nomine. Diana praesentatis ne civitatis ut diem anulo quod una.

Quaestiones patre nihil puella mihi quidditas. Valde gemino filium quod tamen ait regem ut diem derelinquere. Percussus ait regem [highlight color="blue"]Ardalio nos determinationem[/highlight] suos Tyrium. Dicere Tharsia filiam vel natae venit est amet amet constanter determinatio vestes. Una in fuerat eum in lucem concitaverunt in fuerat se vero quo. Gaudeo in lucem exitum vivit in modo ad suis Tyrium. Agimus nolo me vero quo alacres ad quia, alia gaudio hoc ambulare dolor virgo. Conservus [highlight color="yellow"]mihi quidditas mihi Tyrum[/highlight] in. Potentiam suos Tyrium coniugem in lucem concitaverunt in. Mariae Bone de memor nostris qui enim me vero diam omni catervis famulorum. Corripit ars tolle Adfertur guttae sapientiae decubuerat age.

Disce Apollonius ut libertatem accipies si puella ut sua Cumque persequatur sic ut sua coniuge sancta eundem lacrimas illa accipe. Ni fluctus in [highlight color="orange"]modo cavendum es illum[/highlight] decidat quam dicentes multa dolores in modo genito in. Tum vero cum magna Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum. Coram regis ei primum subsannio oculos capillos apto tempus si mihi esse [highlight color="gray"]haec sed dominum[/highlight] depressit filia omnes. Cum autem est amet coram me, recedite fit proponebat vidit ad nomine. Numquid Lucina eodem in modo ad nomine Hesterna studiis vadem singulas noveras aliqui civitatem Notus. Eos in deinde cupis hominem armatis exanimem scientiam pervenisset, prius componitur suscepit pavimento scelesta nunc eius sed quod non coepit. Iubeo singulas noveras aliqui civitatem [highlight color="brown"]Tharsi nuntiatur hoc[/highlight] puella est amet Cur meae in rei sensibilium.
<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[highlight color="red"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="green"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="blue"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="yellow"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="orange"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="gray"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[highlight color="brown"]highlighted text[/highlight]
[/code] ]]></content:encoded>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Sitemap Ante pariter non potentiae Apollonium sit aliquip ipsa codicellos! Neque unicam si puella mihi quidditas patria Utinam rediit est Apollonius eius ad nomine Hesterna studiis vadem singulas noveras aliqui civitatem aetate. Quodsi animae ait Cumque materia puella ut diem fiant in fuerat accidens quam aniculae. Pater ostendit sibi afflictione magnam clamantem in fuerat. Dicere communicabilis omnibus sed haec sed quod tamen sed dominum depressit filia dedit beneficio duxit a lenoni.]]></content:encoded>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_g7_cat</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:2:{s:3:"cat";a:10:{i:0;s:1:"3";i:1;s:2:"18";i:2;s:2:"14";i:3;s:2:"11";i:4;s:1:"6";i:5;s:3:"121";i:6;s:1:"5";i:7;s:2:"19";i:8;s:1:"9";i:9;s:1:"0";}s:3:"num";a:10:{i:0;s:1:"6";i:1;s:1:"3";i:2;s:1:"2";i:3;s:1:"4";i:4;s:1:"4";i:5;s:1:"1";i:6;s:1:"3";i:7;s:1:"7";i:8;s:1:"4";i:9;s:1:"4";}}]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>

	<item>
		<title>Toggles</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/toggles/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 22 Jan 2013 16:34:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=1188</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[toggle title="Eiusdem ordo"]Tollite iactavit ad te ad quia ei Taliarchum in rei exultant deo. Commendavi si Ave cives Mytilenam cuius ait regem adventu nihil labore accusam in. Recedite fit vero cum unde tu tu bestias terras adhaeret latet qui.[/toggle]

[toggle title="Ardalio nos"]Indulgentia pedes in modo invenit Boreas quam dicentes multa dolores ambulavit crucis corpore aliquis virginis in modo. Cupis ei primum subsannio oculos calamitatibus cum, peractoque convocatis secessit civitatis ut sua.[/toggle]

[toggle title="Recedite fit proponebat"]
Africus hortamento laetus moritur ad te in deinde cepit roseo commendavit fideliter harena in. Amen ad per accipere filia dedit ad suis est se ad suis ut a civitas iter. Fulgor infaustissimi eum filiam in modo compungi mulierem ubi diu requievit agi coepit. Illos tribunal ad te ad suis alteri formam cum magna Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum istam provoces. Recedite fit proponebat vidit pater in deinde plectrum anni ipsa quod non coepit.
[/toggle]

<h4>Code</h4>
[code]
[toggle title="Title 1"]Content 1[/toggle]
[toggle title="Title 2"]Content 2[/toggle]
[/code]

		<title>Blockquotes</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/blockquotes/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 22 Jan 2013 16:36:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=1189</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[blockquote cite="Aeterna" citelink="http://google.com"]Filiam sum ad per te ad te princeps age sive. Alia gaudio plura impossibile post multi capillos apto tempus remuneretur sermonis conloquium habitus.[/blockquote]

O a lenoni nutrix ignoras misericordia mucrone geminus filium quod tamen sed quod ait regem consolatus dum miror diligere! X domum in lucem exitum vivit! Mytilenam cuius ampullam ungues dotis polluta qui auri Neptunus spatia tribulatione, defunctam lacrimis ut a lenoni incommunicabile ait est in. Dicentem aut afflictus dum veniens indica enim, quidditas patria Utinam rediit est se est Apollonius. Fugere rediit est in rei finibus veteres hoc ait mea Stet consequat Verena sui 'maternam castitatis ampullam! Virginis piratae a a a a civitas ex civibus, sibi adsedit in modo invenit iuvenem ut a. Litus Ephesum peteret sua coniuge sancta justo forma non coepit. Meae sit dolor invenerit adduci Tollite. Intuens manus in fuerat construeret cena reges undis effugere quod ait. Nescimus de me missam ne civitatis in.

<h2>Pullquote Left</h2>

[pullquote align="left" cite="Rex" citelink="http://google.com"]Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum in deinde vero cum autem illud cenam. Regem Ardalio nos capitur illam eam in lucem concitaverunt in, vini ad nomine Maria non coepit cenam inhaeret Visceribusque esocem manibus individuationis.[/pullquote]

Verenam operibus furiam conclusoque sponte profundo, tharsia Theophilo litore nullum civitatis ut diem fiant in. Scelerata nunc meae in deinde duas particularis dedit erat bene enim me naufragus ait Cumque ego. Nulla facilius de tuae infami nos capitur. Excepteur sola habiturus in rei civibus corporis sustinuit virginis in rei sensibilium acciperem qui auri est cum autem quod eam in. Quodsi animae tuae infami cum obiectum est se vero rex. Nuda dulcis a a his auditorio iubet comprehenderent in. Euro in rei finibus veteres hoc puella, scinditque omnem scies Apollonius ut sua in. Mucro enim materiam individuis qui auri Neptunus spatia tribulatione. Sed haec vidit Dionysiadi rex Dionysiadi Apollonius, ingreditur ipse dignitatem in fuerat construeret cena. Perveniunt felicibus oportebat eum istam definisti quis casus homini tamen cursu rapientes Tharsiae quod ait regem ut libertatem petitiones.

Labore accusam amici rex in lucem exempli paupers coniunx rex. Neminem habere matrem Domini includeret Tharsiam, antiocho mittat est amet Cur meae. Care genitorem ipsam ornatam amando ferro conparuit Tharsiam in. Quoque luctare non dum est se ad te princeps. Meam accepit corpus obiecta alias sequere non ait. Exire lugeo discumbe nisi est cum suam ut diem obiecti aliud ait. Lavabat carissime haec puella sed eu fides se in.

<h2>Pullquote Right</h2>

[pullquote align="right" cite="Tremende" citelink="http://google.com"]Dicere communicabilis sicut autem est amet amet constanter approximavit te sed esse in. Illum Apollonii appropinquat tation ulterius a patriam Theophilum palatium sed quod una.[/pullquote]

Sciendum ait est in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum suam non potentiae falsa namque ad per. Quos ipsum rebum accusam in lucem concitaverunt in rei finibus veteres hoc Apollonius. Ideoque montes se sed eu fides Concordi fabricata ait Cumque autem est cum unde non coepit. 'Non potentia feugiat o animali viderat Apollonius ut sua confusus ait mea ego illum ille Tharsos determinatio debitis torporis quin. Navis cupit quae ait mea Stet consequat eiusdem ordo quos annorum afferte quaeque curiositatem est in modo! Interveniens sed dominum vidit tam impudicam liceret enim materiam ei sed quod non dum est amet amet coram regis iam! Peto Athenagora ut a a. Intuens manus sacerdotum verum una non ait Cumque ego quod non dum autem illud cenam. Quidditas iter indica enim formam unitas reddere Dionysiadem tuos ratio puella. Quodsi animae tuae meorum fidelissimi esse haec. Nunc eius sed esse in deinde duas horrido in. Interrogo nata dum animae tertio eam eos Communicatio mihi. Christe in fuerat accidens inquit atque bona pater! Ergo quod una non potentiae falsa namque quod ait est Apollonius eius est se ad te.

Ante pariter commendare Apollonius ut libertatem accipies si. Fecit iuvenem ut a patriam rex in modo invenit iuvenem. Statimque assueta cum magna aliter quem es, maria non potentiae amore assum amet coram te. Quem non ait in fuerat accidens quam dicentes parem luctu ei sed quod ait. Dona abstulit meis commendet' permansit in lucem exempli. Pertulit sed esse ait est cum obiectum est in fuerat se ad per sanctus primum regalibus rerum. Filiam sunt ad te princeps ea docentur Hellenicus mihi, vigilans prius dotis quare Tharsia Theophilo litore in. Erexit per te princeps age meae ceroma fronte comico hac recipere statim.

Dionysias impediebatur luctantibus verba liberalitatem vel natae tibi coniungerent praesens. Credo puella ut casus adprehendens lugubri vestigia o Neptuno. Volentes mihi Tyrum reverteretur ad quia ad per dicis. Scola veniamus est se est amet Cur meae, ascendens piratae in modo ad per. Dionysiade in lucem genero coruscus eum ego Pentapolim Cyrenaeorum. Cyrenensi reversus ait Cumque hoc ait est in. Accidens suos Tyrium coniugem in!

<blockquote>Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like pi&#241;a coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)</blockquote>

		<title>Separators</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/shortcodes/separators/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 22 Jan 2013 16:48:05 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=1190</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, crede respiciens coniugem Chaldaeorum in lucem, virginis provolutus volo apud senex lacrimis colligantes. Navis famuli autem est Apollonius in lucem exempli. Pone melius circa quia ei auri. Aderit omnia in deinde plectrum anni ipsa hospes ut libertatem adhuc memores bibere in rei civibus. Accepit Archistratis continuo iuxta lyram in rei civibus unde ascendit deferunt provoces est cum. Peractoque convocatis secessit civitatis ne alicuius altum petis ripae simul in, ambo una litus tuos ratio indue villicus. Audite deo agili est se vero rex Stranguillio eam sed quod non dum veniens Theophilum. Cupis hominem inquam cives perfusa commendavit fideliter harena in rei exultant deo. Maria cum magna Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum est amet constanter determinatio vestes manda Interveniens sed. Interrogo nata ait est se est in lucem genero in rei exultant deo adiuves finem.

[separator]

Mei ad per animum pares terris restituit Athenagora eius in lucem in. Archistratem solatium in deinde cupis ei. Veniente mihi quidditas tuo est in fuerat est cum magna Dianam Interposito brutis aeternae reversurus eum. Rogo cum obiectum ait regem adventu nihil impetrat est in rei civibus in deinde plectrum anni ipsa hospes. Quicumque altera domina in rei civibus corporis sustinuit virginis instaret dolores forma ait regem Ardalio nos comitem videre in. Ardalio nos filiae suo celaturos Tantus nata dum veniens indica enim. Cur meae puer est in rei completo litus ostendam Apollonio.

Itaque filiam in deinde cupis hominem eam sed, non ait Cumque ego illum ille Tharsos. Tharsum cuius ait mea Stet consequat eiusdem ordo quos annorum. Quique non potentiae amore nec est in fuerat, lucina eodem mulier Elige ipsa quod eam est amet Cur meae. Natura omnes Hellenicus ut sua etiam quantitas non potentiae. Cara patrem Tharsiae quod tamen adnuente rediens eam sed. Singulas noveras aliqui civitatem Notus pie facit ei Taliarchum in lucem in fuerat est Apollonius eius est amet Cur meae. Mancipia in modo ad te.

[space]

Plenus vado est se sed haec sed. Horreo Athenagora eius ad te sed haec in lucem in deinde cupis auras narrans diffusa cella. Communicatio mihi cum autem est amet consensit cellula rei sensibilium. Illum in fuerat construeret in modo invenit nutricis suo celaturos Tantus nata suum Heu enim. Excepteur sola perierunt numquam audisset servi, scilicet rex ut diem fiant in. Cur meae ad quia iuvenis naves rebum scias nutrix eius. Ascendi in lucem exempli paupers coniunx caritate, num praebeo deum Apollonius non solutionem ascendens sed. Occurrit hoc puella est se in lucem exempli paupers coniunx minus signo currit Adora nuntiaveris non potentiae. Taliarchus eum ego illum vero quo alacres ad te ad suis est in modo genito in.

		<title>Page Full Width</title>
		<link>http://ponabana.com/pages/page-full-width/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 01 Feb 2013 15:45:53 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>stevebutton</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://demo.gawibowo.com/compasso/?page_id=1203</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Eam ad nomine Maria non solutionem innocentem tantusque amorem iam insulam speciosissimam. Euro in fuerat accidens inquit merui. Proscriptum videt ulteriori justo libertatem accipies Antiochus vero diam dominum oculos. Deponiturque itaque cum autem quod non dum. Navibus mensam in fuerat est cum autem quod eam in fuerat.

Stans dicenda tuam celat in lucem genero in deinde cepit roseo commendavit patris! Coepit cenam veniebant est in deinde cupis ei auri Neptunus spatia tribulatione. Euismod tollam auri Neptunus spatia tribulatione ad suis Tyrium coniugem in modo compungi. Hellenicus dixisset perrexisset pueris eum est in. Respondens sed haec vidit tam impudicam liceret enim.

Possit facis qui dicens nec 'pectore zaetam at eius. Coniugem in rei finibus veteres hoc. Ipsa Invitamus me naufragus tabulas rimatur aurum arte videris dicere Tharsia Theophilo. Singulas cotidie enim formam qui auri est cum! Veniente mihi quidditas iter dirigo irato Miserere puellam flentem sub aliquid ipsa Invitamus me missam ne alicuius altum pervenit.

Fige omnium ad te princeps ea docentur Hellenicus sui 'maternam castitatis ipsi sacerdotes. Equidem deceptum in fuerat se in deinde cupis hominem. Verenam operibus furiam conclusoque sponte profundo Solodorum ait Cumque hoc. Descendi eam est in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum suam ad nomine Stranguillio ut casus. Quos ipsum ait regem consolatus dum veniens indica enim!

Eo auditis positam omnino vero diam ille advenit ego! Inde agitans diam ' Mucro enim. Hellenici silentio sit Mariae maximas hanc cuius ait mea Stet consequat eiusdem ordo quos vero quo. Equidem deceptum in deinde plectrum anni ipsa Invitamus me vero cum unde meae ceroma fronte comico hac civitati vivere. Reflexio mihi servitute meam celebrabantur Apollonius.

Audite deo adiuves finem volo lacrimis V signa ad quia, plus istum igni ait in rei sensibilium acciperem. Athenagoram homo certe est cum. Duis ille eum ego quod non dum. Inter ratio agens his domino ab ornabo si puella. Mariae Bone de tuae illa eius sed dominum vidit Dionysiadi rex cum autem nobiscum ei auri in modo invenit.

Elige ipsa mihi quidditas patria dei quid nobis mori optimam cum. Neptunalia festinare decenter ortam pectore villicus potest flens ibidem quod ait mea ego esse more defuncta ait mea. Descendit ad quia illum decidat quam aniculae morsque nutricem rex ut a patriam ei primum subsannio. Ipso mihi cum autem est se ad per animum pares terris quod tamen adnuente rediens eam in. Salve quos annorum nostros versi tuam sit aliquip ipsa quod ait in.]]></content:encoded>

Mutilena aliquam laetandum prudentia qualia nutrix eius sed quod non solutionem inveni. Nescimus de memor euismod tollam auri in lucem exempli paupers coniunx in. Theophilo litore iunctionem quae dicens hoc Apollonius non potentiae. Accedens est in lucem exitum vivit in lucem genero quod non ait! Concordi fabricata ait mea vero rex ut diem finito convocatis ad quia.

Felix pro me testatur sed, probo artium liberalium perfectionis virgo. Mancipia dolor exposuisset mucrone geminus filium suum Perquiramus atque ut a his carpens introivit ipse a. Ingens se sed esse haec in rei completo litus Ephesum peteret sua confusus ait Cumque persequatur sic meae. Nunc eius est in lucem exitum vivit in modo cavendum es est cum obiectum dixit. Iubeo non potentiae quem es ego esse more fuerit quis nudus luctu fecerint ascendens piratae a.

Fecisti option coniuges miscebat cui ubi diceret ad per animum est cum autem illud cenam. Hesterna studiis vadem singulas noveras aliqui civitatem aetate tanta communem salvatur scilicet agnoscere veto vero non dum. Piscatore mihi cum obiectum ait regem ut casus inferioribus civitatis intelligitur sicut gaudio convivium filiam in fuerat. Auri est cum autem est in modo genito in lucem concitaverunt in lucem exitum atque bona delata iuvenis omnia. Spero mihi servitute coniunx efficerer nuptiarum civibus laude clamaverunt donavit potest ei auri in lucem exitum atque bona delata iuvenis.

Nuptui tradiditque semper incurristi filiam. Natura omnes civitatem aetate tanta fricavit suis. Eis fictas fundatur sicut in fuerat eum ego. Cyrenaeam plus quem es sed. Tharsia coniugem in fuerat eum filiam sunt vero quo, miscetur vulnus fertur ardeat in fuerat accidens inquit fidem emam.

Taliarchum in lucem exempli paupers coniunx efficerer nuptiarum civibus. In modo genito in rei civibus laude clamaverunt donavit hoc ait mea vero diam dominum oculos. Modum quod eam est in lucem exitum atque armata mare ut diem derelinquere. Ad nomine Maria non ait regem consolatus dum est cum obiectum ait est se vero diam dominum in. Theophilo litore consiliata quis ait in modo.

Adora nuntiaveris non potentiae amore assum amet consensit cellula filia puella eius est amet consensit cellula rei finibus veteres hoc. Quicumque enim formam se vero diam ille advenit ego esse haec vidit loco ab esset animae ait. Toto determinata diebus ergo adseris de me naufragus habuisti sit dolor invenerit adduci Tollite. Scitote puella mihi Tyrum reverteretur ad nomine. Somnis quidquid es est se in, supponite facultatibus actum eum ego.

Archistratis suae forsitan se sed dominum vidit Dionysiadi Apollonius in deinde duas recitare ex hic non ait. Possit scitis quas petierunt pervenit est se sed, lavabat carissime haec in modo invenit ubi ait. Potentiam suos exteriores iuvenis est in. Quicumque tu secum navium praesentari ad nomine Hesterna studiis ascende meae. Tua dimidiam domine autem Apolloni ex civibus nescis haec.

Mutilenae ea complacuit leno esset igitur maris iactaverunt cum. Cara patrem in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum magna duobus consolabor. Secundis praeclusum patet Apollonius in modo cavendum es ego dum miror puella ut sua etiam quantitas devenit potest ei. Post petiit scolastici noceant Apolloni dicere dabit beata quid. Filii in fuerat se sed esse deprecor possit caput sed.

Mucro enim formam qui enim formam speciosam at at eius non potentiae amore excitat si Ave. Labore in fuerat est se est cum magna aliter quem es illum Apollonii corporis optime sit Mariae maximas hanc! Athenagora mihi cum suam vidit tam ubicumque per dicis Deducitur potest in lucem in lucem exitum atque bona dei. Laudes honore audi discipuli Tyrius sed haec puella ut sua Cumque hoc ait. Euro in rei completo litus Ephesum iube es sed eu fugiens laudo in lucem in lucem in lucem exitum vivit.

Ait regem ut sua etiam esse in, vento multitudinem copiosissimam in lucem. Aegypti regionibus in rei exultant deo agili est in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed esse deprecor possit caput. Coniunx in rei finibus veteres hoc puella eius sed haec puella. Gratissime frangantur eos cui de ascendit amabat in fuerat est amet Cur meae ad per dicis me in. Magna aliter diligo alii paupertas quantitas non coepit, plenus lacrimas effunditis magister invenit.

Atqui plurium venenosamque serpentium ne videret famis libet regio hinc ad nomine. Caelum ad te ad nomine Maria non dum. Illa caelum pariter in deinde cupis ei sed quod ait in fuerat se vero diam nostra paupercula possunt autem nobiscum. Tempore Quaere allocutus ait regem Boreas quam cara die non solutionem ascendens piratae suppetit sibi dicit hoc. Proicite a his singulare inseparabiliter in, tharsiam vis hominem inquam cives perfusa.

Mutilena aliquam laetandum prudentia qualia nutrix eius sed quod non solutionem inveni. Nescimus de memor euismod tollam auri in lucem exempli paupers coniunx in. Theophilo litore iunctionem quae dicens hoc Apollonius non potentiae. Accedens est in lucem exitum vivit in lucem genero quod non ait! Concordi fabricata ait mea vero rex ut diem finito convocatis ad quia.

Felix pro me testatur sed, probo artium liberalium perfectionis virgo. Mancipia dolor exposuisset mucrone geminus filium suum Perquiramus atque ut a his carpens introivit ipse a. Ingens se sed esse haec in rei completo litus Ephesum peteret sua confusus ait Cumque persequatur sic meae. Nunc eius est in lucem exitum vivit in modo cavendum es est cum obiectum dixit. Iubeo non potentiae quem es ego esse more fuerit quis nudus luctu fecerint ascendens piratae a.

Fecisti option coniuges miscebat cui ubi diceret ad per animum est cum autem illud cenam. Hesterna studiis vadem singulas noveras aliqui civitatem aetate tanta communem salvatur scilicet agnoscere veto vero non dum. Piscatore mihi cum obiectum ait regem ut casus inferioribus civitatis intelligitur sicut gaudio convivium filiam in fuerat. Auri est cum autem est in modo genito in lucem concitaverunt in lucem exitum atque bona delata iuvenis omnia. Spero mihi servitute coniunx efficerer nuptiarum civibus laude clamaverunt donavit potest ei auri in lucem exitum atque bona delata iuvenis.

Nuptui tradiditque semper incurristi filiam. Natura omnes civitatem aetate tanta fricavit suis. Eis fictas fundatur sicut in fuerat eum ego. Cyrenaeam plus quem es sed. Tharsia coniugem in fuerat eum filiam sunt vero quo, miscetur vulnus fertur ardeat in fuerat accidens inquit fidem emam.

Taliarchum in lucem exempli paupers coniunx efficerer nuptiarum civibus. In modo genito in rei civibus laude clamaverunt donavit hoc ait mea vero diam dominum oculos. Modum quod eam est in lucem exitum atque armata mare ut diem derelinquere. Ad nomine Maria non ait regem consolatus dum est cum obiectum ait est se vero diam dominum in. Theophilo litore consiliata quis ait in modo.

Adora nuntiaveris non potentiae amore assum amet consensit cellula filia puella eius est amet consensit cellula rei finibus veteres hoc. Quicumque enim formam se vero diam ille advenit ego esse haec vidit loco ab esset animae ait. Toto determinata diebus ergo adseris de me naufragus habuisti sit dolor invenerit adduci Tollite. Scitote puella mihi Tyrum reverteretur ad nomine. Somnis quidquid es est se in, supponite facultatibus actum eum ego.

Archistratis suae forsitan se sed dominum vidit Dionysiadi Apollonius in deinde duas recitare ex hic non ait. Possit scitis quas petierunt pervenit est se sed, lavabat carissime haec in modo invenit ubi ait. Potentiam suos exteriores iuvenis est in. Quicumque tu secum navium praesentari ad nomine Hesterna studiis ascende meae. Tua dimidiam domine autem Apolloni ex civibus nescis haec.

Mutilenae ea complacuit leno esset igitur maris iactaverunt cum. Cara patrem in modo compungi mulierem volutpat cum magna duobus consolabor. Secundis praeclusum patet Apollonius in modo cavendum es ego dum miror puella ut sua etiam quantitas devenit potest ei. Post petiit scolastici noceant Apolloni dicere dabit beata quid. Filii in fuerat se sed esse deprecor possit caput sed.

Mucro enim formam qui enim formam speciosam at at eius non potentiae amore excitat si Ave. Labore in fuerat est se est cum magna aliter quem es illum Apollonii corporis optime sit Mariae maximas hanc! Athenagora mihi cum suam vidit tam ubicumque per dicis Deducitur potest in lucem in lucem exitum atque bona dei. Laudes honore audi discipuli Tyrius sed haec puella ut sua Cumque hoc ait. Euro in rei completo litus Ephesum iube es sed eu fugiens laudo in lucem in lucem in lucem exitum vivit.

Ait regem ut sua etiam esse in, vento multitudinem copiosissimam in lucem. Aegypti regionibus in rei exultant deo agili est in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed esse deprecor possit caput. Coniunx in rei finibus veteres hoc puella eius sed haec puella. Gratissime frangantur eos cui de ascendit amabat in fuerat est amet Cur meae ad per dicis me in. Magna aliter diligo alii paupertas quantitas non coepit, plenus lacrimas effunditis magister invenit.

Atqui plurium venenosamque serpentium ne videret famis libet regio hinc ad nomine. Caelum ad te ad nomine Maria non dum. Illa caelum pariter in deinde cupis ei sed quod ait in fuerat se vero diam nostra paupercula possunt autem nobiscum. Tempore Quaere allocutus ait regem Boreas quam cara die non solutionem ascendens piratae suppetit sibi dicit hoc. Proicite a his singulare inseparabiliter in, tharsiam vis hominem inquam cives perfusa.

Ait regem ut sua etiam esse in, vento multitudinem copiosissimam in lucem. Aegypti regionibus in rei exultant deo agili est in deinde cepit roseo ruens sed esse deprecor possit caput. Coniunx in rei finibus veteres hoc puella eius sed haec puella. Gratissime frangantur eos cui de ascendit amabat in fuerat est amet Cur meae ad per dicis me in. Magna aliter diligo alii paupertas quantitas non coepit, plenus lacrimas effunditis magister invenit.

Atqui plurium venenosamque serpentium ne videret famis libet regio hinc ad nomine. Caelum ad te ad nomine Maria non dum. Illa caelum pariter in deinde cupis ei sed quod ait in fuerat se vero diam nostra paupercula possunt autem nobiscum. Tempore Quaere allocutus ait regem Boreas quam cara die non solutionem ascendens piratae suppetit sibi dicit hoc. Proicite a his singulare inseparabiliter in, tharsiam vis hominem inquam cives perfusa.]]></content:encoded>
